data.taskTitle: on /tasks turn the sessions-table into a component (TasksActive.svelte or appropriate name)

data.approach: Create a reusable TasksActive component that encapsulates the sessions table with expandable rows, SessionCard embedding, and action handlers. Extract from /tasks page, test, then update both pages to use it.

summary: Identified sessions table on /tasks page as a potential reusable component
Prepared for extracting sessions table into a standalone Svelte component

suggestedTasks.title: Create TaskSessions Svelte Component for Reusable Table
suggestedTasks.description: Extract the sessions table from /tasks into a modular, reusable Svelte component. The new component should handle rendering sessions data, support dynamic data passing, and maintain existing styling. Focus on creating a flexible, generic component that can be used across different views and contexts.
suggestedTasks.reason: Identified opportunity for component modularity and code reuse

suggestedTasks.title: Add PropTypes and Default Props for New Sessions Component
suggestedTasks.description: Implement robust prop typing and default properties for the new TaskSessions component to ensure type safety and predictable behavior. Use TypeScript or Svelte's type annotations to define expected input shapes and provide sensible defaults.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure type safety and predictable component behavior

gotchas: Ensure existing table functionality is preserved
